trans-unit.source: This article explains how to support the Share contract in a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app.
trans-unit.target: This article explains how to support the Share contract in a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app.

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: This article explains how to support the Share contract in a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app.
trans-unit.target: This article explains how to support the Share contract in a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app.

trans-unit.source: The Share contract is an easy way to quickly share data, such as text, links, photos, and videos, between apps.
trans-unit.target: The Share contract is an easy way to quickly share data, such as text, links, photos, and videos, between apps.

trans-unit.source: For example, a user might want to share a webpage with their friends using a social networking app, or save a link in a notes app to refer to later.
trans-unit.target: For example, a user might want to share a webpage with their friends using a social networking app, or save a link in a notes app to refer to later.

trans-unit.source: Add a [**DataRequested**][DataRequested] event handler to be called whenever a user invokes share.
trans-unit.target: Add a [**DataRequested**][DataRequested] event handler to be called whenever a user invokes share.

trans-unit.source: This can occur either when the user taps a control in your app (such as a button or app bar command) or automatically in a specific scenario (if the user finishes a level and gets a high score, for example).
trans-unit.target: This can occur either when the user taps a control in your app (such as a button or app bar command) or automatically in a specific scenario (if the user finishes a level and gets a high score, for example).

trans-unit.source: When a [**DataRequested**][DataRequested] event occurs, your app receives a [**DataRequest**][DataRequest] object.
trans-unit.target: When a [**DataRequested**][DataRequested] event occurs, your app receives a [**DataRequest**][DataRequest] object.

trans-unit.source: This contains a [**DataPackage**][DataPackage] that you can use to provide the content that the user wants to share.
trans-unit.target: This contains a [**DataPackage**][DataPackage] that you can use to provide the content that the user wants to share.

trans-unit.source: You must provide a title and data to share.
trans-unit.target: You must provide a title and data to share.

trans-unit.source: A description is optional, but recommended.
trans-unit.target: A description is optional, but recommended.

trans-unit.source: You can share various types of data, including:
trans-unit.target: You can share various types of data, including:

trans-unit.source: The [**DataPackage**][DataPackage] object can contain one or more of these formats, in any combination.
trans-unit.target: The [**DataPackage**][DataPackage] object can contain one or more of these formats, in any combination.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates sharing text.
trans-unit.target: The following example demonstrates sharing text.

trans-unit.source: When you package data for sharing, you can supply a variety of properties that provide additional information about the content being shared.
trans-unit.target: When you package data for sharing, you can supply a variety of properties that provide additional information about the content being shared.

trans-unit.source: These properties help target apps improve the user experience.
trans-unit.target: These properties help target apps improve the user experience.

trans-unit.source: For example, a description helps when the user is sharing content with more than one app.
trans-unit.target: For example, a description helps when the user is sharing content with more than one app.

trans-unit.source: Adding a thumbnail when sharing an image or a link to a web page provides a visual reference to the user.
trans-unit.target: Adding a thumbnail when sharing an image or a link to a web page provides a visual reference to the user.

trans-unit.source: All properties except the title are optional.
trans-unit.target: All properties except the title are optional.

trans-unit.source: The title property is mandatory and must be set.
trans-unit.target: The title property is mandatory and must be set.

trans-unit.source: A UI for sharing is provided by the system.
trans-unit.target: A UI for sharing is provided by the system.

trans-unit.source: To launch it, call the [**ShowShareUI**][ShowShareUi] method.
trans-unit.target: To launch it, call the [**ShowShareUI**][ShowShareUi] method.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, sharing content is a straightforward process.
trans-unit.target: In most cases, sharing content is a straightforward process.

trans-unit.source: However, there's always a chance that something unexpected could happen.
trans-unit.target: However, there's always a chance that something unexpected could happen.

trans-unit.source: For example, the app might require the user to select content for sharing but the user didn't select any.
trans-unit.target: For example, the app might require the user to select content for sharing but the user didn't select any.

trans-unit.source: To handle these situations, use the [**FailWithDisplayText**][FailWithDisplayText] method, which will display a message to the user if something goes wrong.
trans-unit.target: To handle these situations, use the [**FailWithDisplayText**][FailWithDisplayText] method, which will display a message to the user if something goes wrong.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, it might not make sense to prepare the data that the user wants to share right away.
trans-unit.target: Sometimes, it might not make sense to prepare the data that the user wants to share right away.

trans-unit.source: For example, if your app supports sending a large image file in several different possible formats, it's inefficient to create all those images before the user makes their selection.
trans-unit.target: For example, if your app supports sending a large image file in several different possible formats, it's inefficient to create all those images before the user makes their selection.

trans-unit.source: To solve this problem, a [**DataPackage**][DataPackage] can contain a delegate — a function that is called when the receiving app requests data.
trans-unit.target: To solve this problem, a [**DataPackage**][DataPackage] can contain a delegate — a function that is called when the receiving app requests data.

trans-unit.source: We recommend using a delegate any time that the data a user wants to share is resource-intensive.
trans-unit.target: We recommend using a delegate any time that the data a user wants to share is resource-intensive.
